original_title: Richmond: McClean Avenue - Lilly Pond Avenue
text:
45 McClean Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Lily Pond Avenue. The mansion was owned by Richardson, in 1874 (Beers's map); by Anna M. King, from 1898 to 1907 (Robinson maps); and by E. H. Eglinton, in 1917 (Bromley's map).

June 2, 1935

P. L. Sperr
